turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Rebecca, it looks like this meeting is going to last until dinner time. Could you please order about 3 pizzas from Capri's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes ma'am. Do you want this to be delivered or do you want me to send someone to pick it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I want it to be picked up so that we can eat it while it's hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That will be fine. Do you want me to order the usual combination or a previous order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I actually want to change it up a bit. The first pizza you know is always a Lg Cheese Only, cut in squares

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Were you wanting to make the next two a vegetarian and pepperoni pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, actually, I want to have a LG cheese and ground sirloin. Could you make sure it's ground sirloin and not ground beef?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes ma'am. What about the last pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just may have to order a 4th one. How about let's do a Med Vegetarian pizza, a Med Meat Lovers and why not a Med Pepperoni Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you're wanting 6 pizzas all together?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct. I need them all to be cut in squares.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, no problem. It looks like they have a special going on with all pizzas are $10 any size.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's wonderful. Just make sure that we can have the pizzas picked up in time for dinner at 6:00 p.m.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. So, let me confirm, I have 1 Large Cheese Pizza, 1 Large Cheese & Ground Sirloin, 1 Medium Vegetarian, 1 Medium Pepperoni and 1 Median Meat Lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is correct and it looks like there's only 5 all together.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes ma'am you are correct. I'll have them put it on our corporate account.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh Rebecca, make sure that you let them know specifically to slice the pizza in squares.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have that in the special instructions. Is there anything else you need to add to the pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So your order will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes or less which you can track on their app.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok Perfect, I'll send someone from the meeting to go pick them up when they are done.
